sections.heading: in custody of State Treasurer; held in name of nominee; registered nominee; selection
sections.text: All securities purchased or held shall be in the custody of the State Treasurer who may deposit with a fiscal agent in any financial institution, approved by the Nebraska Investment Council, such securities as he s
